title: 【1.8】Norzeteus-Space 未来科技风材质
author: 传播MC能量
txt_content: 质，低配电脑还是别玩了，显卡危机啊！

replies.author: cowb
replies.txt_content:
标题: 【1.8】Norzeteus-Space 未来科技风材质 本帖最后由 cowb 于 2015-4-7 19:35 编辑 

     

   此材质包的灵感来源于“Tron Legacy”  也是就“创战纪”。有一种独特的风格，复古加上未来的元素，喜欢科技的玩家可以尝试用一下！




















怪物们;






有一种机器人的感觉~


http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XOTE3ODk2NTQ4.html





没人看得更新日志（英文，懒得翻译）
Figured out, how to do 3D modells. Changed ladder and safetybarrier (dark-oak-fence,animated) to 3D. Changed chimney to wet-sponge and changed hardened_clay_stained_gray to CTM double-pipes. Changed texture of jukebox to an animated, try some sounds: /playsound note.bass @p (bassattack,harp,snare,pling) for some alert and other scary sounds. Changed colour of lava New 3D models: Lever, stone- and wooden button, stone- and wooden pressure plate ( all animated) New birch- and jungle fences (animated) New acacia door.brown carpet (real “grid”) New torches, 2 different designs for normal and wall Changed oak_wood_stairs to triangle blocks to building roofs, changed jungle_wood_planks and half slabs to a metall cube, changed jungle_wood_stairs to a metal framework and changed dark_oak_stairs to a office chair


感觉贴子要沉了

    
下面是
【1.8】[64X]Norzeteus-Space :官方下载

【1.8】[128X]Norzeteus-Space：官方下载

replies.author: zhs622301
replies.txt_content: 想通了，该怎么办3D型号。改变了梯子， safetybarrier （深色橡木栅栏，动画）到3D 。改变的烟囱湿海绵和改变hardened_clay_stained_gray到CTM双管道。改变质地点唱机到动画，尝试一些声音： / playsound note.bass @p （ bassattack ，琴，小鼓，耦）对一些警告和其他可怕的声音。熔岩新的3D模型变了颜色：手柄， stone-和木制按钮， stone-和木压盘（全动画）新birch-和丛林围栏（动画）新合欢door.brown地毯（真正的“网格” ）新的火炬， 2个不同的设计正常和墙壁改变oak_wood_stairs三角形块建筑屋顶，改变jungle_wood_planks半砖到METALL立方体，改为jungle_wood_stairs到金属框架和改变dark_oak_stairs到办公椅
